content: भावक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भाव-स्वार्थे क] {@--1@} Effecting, bringing about. {@--2@} Promoting any one's welfare. {@--3@} Fancying, imagining. {@--4@} Having a taste for the sublime and beautiful, having a poetic taste. --कः {@--1@} A feeling, sentiment. {@--2@} The external manifestation of one's sentiments (especially of love).
